title: Maelstrom.. a font with a ghastly name
content:
Please take a look at my new font at [http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/17284758/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414070139/http:/www.deviantart.com/deviation/17284758/)   
(click "download to desktop" for the TTF).   
   
It is my first font, so I'm obviously looking for as much guidance, advice, criticism, etc. as possible.
author: taejo
